attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the PM to change the government's policy so that:
All voters at a general election to have two secret votes. One vote to go to the political party whom the voter might want to achieve political office. The second vote is to nominate the same party or another standing party to receive twenty pounds from the state to use for its political funding. This to be on top of any private funding. All private donations over fifty pounds to be made public.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
